item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:77 Chances: TG Therapeutics stock has seen a welcome improvement in its Relative Strength Rating, indicating positive market activity. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.8% in TG Therapeutics, pointing towards a positive trend in earnings estimate revisions.

item.title: AZN
item.description: score:-135 Chances: AstraZeneca (AZN) closed at $65.95, indicating a +1.77% shift from the previous trading day. AstraZeneca (AZN) announces that it is buying vaccine company, Icosavax. The additional supply of RSV shot for infants by AstraZeneca and Sanofi indicates a positive outlook for meeting winter demand.
